con:config.script:
import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def eventAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventForPurTrax#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'Nights\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

con:restRequest.name: UpdateEventType
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "EventAttributeId": "${eventAttributeId#result}", "AttributeName": "${#TestCase#atributeName}", "CyclicIndicator": true, "CapIndicator": false, "CyclicMapField": "Nights", "IsLineItem": false, "CollectionIndicator": false, "DataTypeDrl": "Double", "DataTypeUi": "Number", "EventType": "${#TestCase#eventType}", "AttributeFqn": "PurchaseTxn.Nights", "DroolsVariableName": "$PurchaseTxn", "CollectionAttribute": false, "UsedAsCyclic": false, "ReturnAttribute": false, "IsValueGroupHierarchy": false, "IsEnrichmentLinkedAttribute": false, "IsEnrichmentAttribute": false, "Status": "A"
}

con:property.con:name: CreateBody
UpdateBody

con:restRequest.name: ValidateTransaction
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "${Transaction#TransactionTypeCode}", "TransactionNetTotal": "${Transaction#TransactionNetTotal}", "ShippingAndHandling": "${Transaction#ShippingAndHandling}", "TransactionTotalTax": "${Transaction#TransactionTotalTax}", "TransactionNumber": "${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "${Transaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${Transaction#StoreCode}", "GrossAmount": "${Transaction#GrossAmount}", "ReservationDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-45)}", "Nights": 3, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": ${Amount1#Amt1}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date())}" }, { "TaxAmount": ${Amount2#Amt2}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 2 }
] }

con:property.con:name: Body
con:property.con:value: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "${Transaction#TransactionTypeCode}", "TransactionNetTotal": "${Transaction#TransactionNetTotal}", "ShippingAndHandling": "${Transaction#ShippingAndHandling}", "TransactionTotalTax": "${Transaction#TransactionTotalTax}", "TransactionNumber": "${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "${Transaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${Transaction#StoreCode}", "GrossAmount": "${Transaction#GrossAmount}", "ReservationDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-45)}", "Nights": 3, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": ${Amount1#Amt1}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date())}" }, { "TaxAmount": ${Amount2#Amt2}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 2 } ] }

con:restRequest.name: ValidateTransactionTwo
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "${Transaction#TransactionTypeCode}", "TransactionNetTotal": "${Transaction#TransactionNetTotal}", "ShippingAndHandling": "${Transaction#ShippingAndHandling}", "TransactionTotalTax": "${Transaction#TransactionTotalTax}", "TransactionNumber": "${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "${Transaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${Transaction#StoreCode}", "GrossAmount": "${Transaction#GrossAmount}", "ReservationDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-45)}", "Nights": 3, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": ${Amount1#Amt1}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 22, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date())}" }, { "TaxAmount": ${Amount2#Amt2}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 13, "LineNumber": 2 }
] }

con:property.con:name: Body
con:property.con:value: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "${Transaction#TransactionTypeCode}", "TransactionNetTotal": "${Transaction#TransactionNetTotal}", "ShippingAndHandling": "${Transaction#ShippingAndHandling}", "TransactionTotalTax": "${Transaction#TransactionTotalTax}", "TransactionNumber": "${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "${Transaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${Transaction#StoreCode}", "GrossAmount": "${Transaction#GrossAmount}", "ReservationDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-45)}", "Nights": 3, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": ${Amount1#Amt1}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 22, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date())}" }, { "TaxAmount": ${Amount2#Amt2}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 13, "LineNumber": 2 } ] }

con:restRequest.name: suspendFirstProTrx
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": 2, "ShippingAndHandling": 10, "TransactionTotalTax": 100, "TransactionNumber":"${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "TRUE", "SuspendReasonCode":"SSPNDFRD", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "GrossAmount": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "ReservationDate": "${ReservationDate#date}", "Night":"3", "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": ${Amount1#Amt1}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date())}" }, { "TaxAmount": ${Amount2#Amt2}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 2 } ] }

con:restRequest.name: suspendFirstProTrxTwo
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": 2, "ShippingAndHandling": 10, "TransactionTotalTax": 100, "TransactionNumber": "${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+2)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "TRUE", "SuspendReasonCode":"SSPNDFRD", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "GrossAmount": "52", "ReservationDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-45)}", "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": 63, "DollarValueGross": 639, "DollarValueNet": 575, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 63, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date())}" }, { "TaxAmount": 36, "DollarValueGross": 639, "DollarValueNet": 575, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 35, "LineNumber": 2, "TransactionDetailDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date())}" } ] }
